Experience Intermediate Software Developer Intel Corporation January 2014  – Present (1 year 8 months) Bangalore, India Working at Intel has been a phenomenal experience for me. I have worked for one of the iconic product like Personal Office Energy Monitor(POEM) which is an energy saving end-user eco-feedback application designed for office use. Its UI provides detailed personalized data on energy usage and ambient conditions to each office user, as well as reporting aggregates for building-level management and policy setting purposes. 
Yet another buzzword in the technological environment around is IoT(Internet of Things). I am currently working toward the development of end-to-end IoT system prototype with edge nodes (a common gateway which connects the nexus of sensors) and a sole comprehensive backend solution hosted on a cloud. Its pragmatically a Sensor as a Service solution.
